StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertCandidateLanguage]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int, @LanguageID varchar(2), @LastEditBy varchar(15) )
AS
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_LANGUAGE] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID AND [LANGUAGE_CODE] = @LanguageID) BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CANDIDATE_LANGUAGE] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[LANGUAGE_CODE] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@PersonID ,@LanguageID ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate()) END
